subject: Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Records and Achievements
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: As Royal Delta glided to victory at Santa Anita Park, Hall of Famer Mike Smith became the winningest jockey in the history of the Breeders’ Cup event.
snippet: As Royal Delta glided to victory at Santa Anita Park, Hall of Famer Mike Smith became the winningest jockey in the history of the Breeders’ Cup event.
